modules.title: Monod Sports — Store Onboarding
modules.description: A quick intro to how we do things, with short checks along the way.

slides.title: Welcome to Monod Sports
slides.bodyHtml: Welcome aboard. This training will give you a feel for our standards, voice, and day-to-day flow. Take your time. You can leave and come back—your progress saves in this browser.

slides.title: What we value
slides.bodyHtml:
• Keep it clean and minimal.
  • Know the product. Speak like a local.
  • Customer experience first.

question.text: Which statement best matches our tone?

options.text: Dense technical jargon at all times.

slides.title: Stockroom basics
slides.bodyHtml: Keep aisles clear. Label everything. Restock on the fly. If you move it, put it back better than you found it.

options.text: If you move it, leave it somewhere new.
If you move it, put it back better.

modules.title: Hiking — Product Basics
modules.description: A short primer on hiking footwear and essentials.

slides.title: Footwear fit
slides.bodyHtml: Fit is everything. Try on with hiking socks. Toes should have room on descents; heel locked on climbs.

options.text: A thumb of space at the toes.
